conclusion: There is a point light source S in a pool emitting monochromatic light A and B, forming illuminated areas on the water surface.
The small circular area is illuminated by polychromatic light, and the large circular area is illuminated by monochromatic light B.
The refractive index of water for monochromatic light A is n_1 and for monochromatic light B is n_2.
The sine value of the refraction angle of monochromatic light B at the boundary of the small circle area is calculated.
